definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: Most people think of wax for protecting their car's paint, but Car Care provide paint sealants as well.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人認爲蠟保護油漆，但是密封膠也有此功能。

sentences.english: A sealant is a non-organic based coating used to seal paint with a thin barrier.
sentences.chinese: 密封膠是無機性外衣用於油漆密封。

sentences.english: Formation mechanism and characterization of anodic aluminum oxide templates;
sentences.chinese: 硅酮密封膠對陽極氧化鋁的黏結質量千差萬別。

sentences.english: The quality of silicone sealant adhesion to anodized aluminum varies widely.
sentences.chinese: 硅酮密封膠對陽極氧化鋁的黏結質量千差萬別。

sentences.english: Fabrication and in vitro performance of anodic alumina containing calcium;
sentences.chinese: 硅酮密封膠對陽極氧化鋁的黏結質量千差萬別。

sentences.english: Use, such as isopropyl alcohol, methyl ethyl ketone, or alcohol solvent remove residual sealant.
sentences.chinese: 使用如異丙醇，丁酮或酒精等溶劑清除殘留的密封膠。

sentences.english: Refers to the elastomer Blends with the thermoplastic resin-based sealant material.
sentences.chinese: 指以彈性體同熱塑性樹脂摻合物爲基料的密封膠。

sentences.english: The talcum powder took the volume auxiliaries , reduced the sealant production cost.
sentences.chinese: 滑石粉作爲體積填充劑，降低了密封膠的生產成本。

sentences.english: It also briefs the application of the sealant.
sentences.chinese: 扼要介紹了該水膨脹防水密封膠的工程應用。

sentences.english: Unlike most paint protection sealants-Seal can be layered for improved results.
sentences.chinese: 與大多數塗料保護密封膠密封可以分層爲更好的結果。

sentences.english: The development trend of insulating glass sealants was reviewed also.
sentences.chinese: 概述了中空玻璃密封膠的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: At present, the company has a domestic sealant industry's largest production base.
sentences.chinese: 目前，公司已擁有國內密封膠行業中最大的生產基地。

sentences.english: Seal the external side of wall-through hole with sealant, putty, paint, etc.
sentences.chinese: 用密封膠泥或油灰塗料等物封住室外側的穿牆孔。

sentences.english: This is no viscous solvent evaporation of polymer-based sealant material.
sentences.chinese: 這是以溶劑揮發後無粘性高聚物爲基料的密封膠。
